RelatedSentence: Commissioner of Greater Visakhapatnam Municipal Corporation ( GVMC ) M.V. Satyaranarayana inspected various wings at the GVMC Main Office on Monday .

He inspected the work being done by the various wings like Town Planning , Public Health , Finance , Accounts , Audit , IT , UCD , ' Saukaryam ' , Registration of Births and Deaths , Printing Press and the Call Centre .

He inspected the work being done by the various wings like Town Planning , Public Health , Finance , Accounts , Audit , IT , UCD , ' Saukaryam ' , Registration of Births and Deaths , Printing Press and the Call Centre .
On coming to know that some employees in the Town Planning Wing were working in the same wing for the past eight years , he directed the officials concerned to transfer them to other wings .
